text: David Peter Bergland (June 4, 1935 â€“ June 3, 2019) was an American politician. He was the United States Libertarian Party's nominee at the 1983 Libertarian National Convention for President of the United States in the 1984 presidential election.David Bergland - Libertarian Advocates for Self- Government Bergland died of prostate cancer on June 3, 2019, one day before his 84th birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Downloadable audio interview with Free Talk Live * (David Bergland) * (Dave Bergland) Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:1984 United States presidential candidates Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Politicians from Iowa Category:Libertarian Party (United States) politicians
title: David Bergland
